summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing the Hero parallax layer that referenced `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg`, but REQ-2 is not implemented (no static asset deletion shown). The diff also includes additional unrelated Hero/UI/content changes and project tracking metadata updates that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the static asset file exists in the repo, delete the corresponding static image file `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` from frontend static assets so it no longer consumes project storage.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff reports `Removed: 0` files and does not show deletion of `/assets/generated/layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` (or any asset file).
evidence: No removed files listed under REMOVED FILES

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial Hero redesign/content additions (e.g., luminous halo, neural-glow overlay, soundtrack/YouTube thumbnails/banner, typography/layout changes, additional overlays like data-grid/geometric overlay, glowing orbs) beyond only removing the specific background layer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove the single Hero parallax background layer for `layered-background.dim_1920x1080.jpg` and not to change other hero visuals/content besides ensuring remaining layers still render.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Hero.tsx description includes multiple new visual/content elements)
